nodes.description: 2014年8月，美国启动Operation Inherent Resolve反恐行动
nodes.support_text: the U.S.-led effort begun in 2014 to combat Islamic State terrorists in Iraq and Syria.

nodes.description: 2016年4月，美国士兵在叙利亚参与反恐行动期间死亡
nodes.support_text: Since 2016, four U.S. troops had been killed in Syria before the latest attack.

nodes.description: 2017年3月，美国士兵在叙利亚参与反恐行动期间死亡
nodes.support_text: Since 2016, four U.S. troops had been killed in Syria before the latest attack.

nodes.description: 2018年10月，美国士兵在叙利亚参与反恐行动期间死亡
nodes.support_text: Since 2016, four U.S. troops had been killed in Syria before the latest attack.

nodes.description: 2023年9月，特朗普宣布击败伊斯兰国
nodes.support_text: less than a month after President Donald Trump declared victory over Islamic State militants in the region.

nodes.description: 2023年10月，特朗普宣布从叙利亚撤出2,000名美军
nodes.support_text: Trump announced that the 2,000 U.S. troops in Syria would be withdrawn.

nodes.description: 2023年10月15日，伊斯兰国宣称的自杀式爆炸在叙利亚曼比季市场发生
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber triggered a fiery explosion Wednesday that killed four U.S. citizens at a market in northern Syria...

nodes.description: 爆炸造成16人死亡，包括2名美军士兵、2名平民及叙利亚民主力量成员
nodes.support_text: a total of 16 people were killed in the midday explosion, including fighters with Syrian Democratic Forces.

nodes.description: 美军中央司令部确认爆炸与伊斯兰国有关
nodes.support_text: the military's Operation Inherent Resolve said in a statement.

nodes.description: 叙利亚人权观察组确认爆炸为自杀式袭击且伤亡达16人
nodes.support_text: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights... said the cause of the explosion was a suicide bomb outside a restaurant.

nodes.description: 白宫宣布已向特朗普通报事件，并慰问受害者家属
nodes.support_text: The White House said Trump was fully briefed on the situation.

nodes.description: 特朗普重申‘伊斯兰国已失败’的言论
nodes.support_text: Vice President Mike Pence repeated Trump's claims about the Islamic State.

nodes.description: 美国国防部确认1名平民为雇员，1名为承包商
nodes.support_text: U.S. Central Command said one of the civilians was employed by the Defense Department.

nodes.description: 美军在爆炸现场发现袭击者伪装成平民的爆炸装置
nodes.support_text: A senior Kurdish security official told NBC News the U.S. forces were on foot... a man wearing civilian clothing that covered the hidden explosives.

nodes.description: 特朗普团队因撤军时间表存在分歧多次调整计划
nodes.support_text: a messy plan for U.S. withdrawal, a decision Trump's senior advisers disagreed with before offering an evolving timetable

nodes.description: 参议员格莱姆公开反对特朗普的叙利亚撤军计划
nodes.support_text: Sen. Lindsey Graham... called on the president to rethink his plans.

nodes.description: 美军装备从叙利亚撤出，撤军进入实施阶段
nodes.support_text: officials announced last week that equipment had been removed from U.S. facilities in Syria.

nodes.description: 2023年10月15日，爆炸导致四名美国公民死亡
nodes.support_text: a total of 16 people were killed in the midday explosion, including four U.S. citizens

nodes.description: 军事官员报告死亡情况
nodes.support_text: military officials reported the death toll

nodes.description: 五角大楼声明强调伊斯兰国仍是致命威胁
nodes.support_text: 轰炸事件强调了五角大楼关于伊斯兰国仍是致命威胁的声明

nodes.description: Operation Inherent Resolve 宣布伤亡情况
nodes.support_text: Operation Inherent Resolve 宣布了伤亡情况

nodes.description: 2016-2023年间叙利亚民主力量部队与美国士兵协同作战事件
